thread.section_title: Comedy Driving, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Comedy Driving, Inc. | comedydriving.com
thread.title: Scott Judge
thread.title_full: Comedy Driving, Inc. reviewed by Scott Judge

author: Scott Judge
title: Scott Judge
text: I appreciate how the Comedy Driving, Inc. course allowed you to start and resume when 'YOU' had the time to finish the 6 hours of required time. The class WAS interesting and kept me focused. There were a few 'jokes' that were a little inappropriate. Although, over all I had a good experience.
